params.text: Changing the way educational experiences are designed, created, and delivered to a new generation of learners.

params.text: Educational resources should be open, free, and easy to create, but they aren't...YET.
Our partners are full of ideas on how to engage learners...but need the tools!
One-stop shop for interactive learning activities
“50% of teachers polled are considering leaving the profession from overwork and 75% don’t have enough time.”*
Smart publishing system that removes the barriers of connecting your immersive content with your learners.
One-stop shop for interactive learning activities
Our core products are free for organizations dedicated to improving education-from our codebase to our software.
One-stop shop for interactive learning activities
Our team of experts and partners can help make sure you are successful with our toolset.
